item.title: EU Commission faces rising pressure to tax vapes and nicotine pouches
item.description: Countries like Italy, Greece and Romania, which have lower taxes than other member states, are against the proposal.

item.title: UK ban on single-use vapes comes into force to stop children's use and cut down on waste
item.description: The UK's move follows e-cigarette restrictions by countries like Belgium and Australia.

item.title: Latest news bulletin | June 2nd – Midday
item.description: Catch up with the most important stories from around Europe and beyond - latest news, breaking news, World, Business, Entertainment, Politics, Culture...

item.title: SoundCloud updates AI policy after backlash: ‘AI should support artists, not replace them’
item.description: A new letter from SoundCloud CEO Eliah Seton states: "We don’t build generative AI tools, and we don’t allow third parties to scrape or use artist con...

item.title: Queues for food grow in Gaza amid spiralling hunger
item.description: Long queues formed outside a charity kitchen in Gaza City on Sunday as desperate families carrying empty pots waited for a ladle of watery soup.
